name: FormalMultilinearSeries.congr
initialProofState:
ğ•œ : Type u
E : Type v
F : Type w

instâœ : ContinuousConstSMul ğ•œ F
p : FormalMultilinearSeries ğ•œ E F
m n : Nat
v : Fin m â†’ E
w : Fin n â†’ E
h1 : Eq m n
h2 : âˆ€ (i : Nat) (him : LT.lt i m) (hin : LT.lt i n), Eq (v âŸ¨i, himâŸ©) (w âŸ¨i, hinâŸ©)
âŠ¢ Eq ((p m) v) ((p n) w)
decl:
/-- Convenience congruence lemma stating in a dependent setting that, if the arguments to a formal
multilinear series are equal, then the values are also equal. -/
theorem congr (p : FormalMultilinearSeries ğ•œ E F) {m n : â„•} {v : Fin m â†’ E} {w : Fin n â†’ E}
    (h1 : m = n) (h2 : âˆ€ (i : â„•) (him : i < m) (hin : i < n), v âŸ¨i, himâŸ© = w âŸ¨i, hinâŸ©) :
    p m v = p n w := by
  subst n
  congr with âŸ¨i, hiâŸ©
  exact h2 i hi hi
